model

Class AbstractFixedGameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractGameObject
      • model.AbstractFixedGameObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICollider, IDrawable, IGameObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FuelCan, OilSlick, Pylon

    public abstract class AbstractFixedGameObject
extends AbstractGameObject
    Abstraction for all game objects which are located in a fixed position.
    Author:
    Robert Wilk

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class model.AbstractGameObject

        centerX, centerY, collisions, CURRENT, PREVIOUS

    • Method Detail

      • setLocation

        protected void setLocation(Location2D location)
        Description copied from class: AbstractGameObject
        This is method is not intended to be invoked by any child class users directly. To change the location of a game object which implements IMovable use IMovable.move(int) to do so. This method will throw UnsupportedOperationException if invoked on a game object with a fixed location.
        Overrides:
        setLocation in class AbstractGameObject
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the object.

      • setLocation

        protected void setLocation(double x,
                           double y)
        Description copied from class: AbstractGameObject
        This is method is not intended to be invoked by any child class users directly. To change the location of a game object which implements IMovable use IMovable.move(int) to do so. This method will throw UnsupportedOperationException if invoked on a game object with a fixed location.
        Overrides:
        setLocation in class AbstractGameObject
        Parameters:
        x - The x-axis value
        y - The y-axis value

        Adds the collision to the list of current collisions.
